posts.post_content:
For Sale is a T202 Mathewson/Meyers/Before the Battle

dressed in a SGC 5 tuxedo

granted, I am biased...but this is a beautiful card in hand and looks great particularly in the SGC slab.  A "5" grade seemed a bit harsh

I apologize for the modest shadows and glare on the pics...I tried to take from a couple of angles to get a good representation.

SOLD

this is below "5" SGC and PSA comps from 2021 for this exact card...and even below comps for the lesser devlin middle panel versions.  an SGC 4 sold for $660 last June...and it wasn't close to this "5"

thanks for looking
sorry...wrong section  working on getting it moved
